question:
The long-range surface-to air missile (LRSAM) is:
  1. a product of joint development project between India and Israel
  2. also known as Barak-NG
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: LRSAM or long-range surface-to air missile (LRSAM) is an Indo-Israeli Barak-2 long range surface-to-air missile (LR-SAM). The state-run Defence Research and Development Organization (DRDO) is the main developer of the Barak-2 LR-SAM and roughly 70 per cent of the missile content is indigenous.
